db:info.db:title: NVIDIA PhysX SDK, version PhysX_4.1.2.29882248
db:info.db:edition: Qt Quick 3D Physics | Commercial or GPLv3

db:article.db:para: The NVIDIA PhysX SDK is a scalable multi-platform physics solution supporting a wide range of devices
Used as a physical simulation backend in Qt Quick 3D Physics
The sources can be found in qtquick3dphysics/src/3rdparty/PhysX.
